Messages: ['You hit a deep hole!', 'There are holes everywhere!', 'The car jumped because of a hole!']
['You hit a pole!', 'A collision with a pole!', 'You got too close to a pole!']
['A deer suddenly appeared in front!', 'A deer crossed the road!', 'Watch out for deer!']
['The road is under construction, slow down!', 'Caution, road under construction!', 'The road is rough due to construction!']
['You entered a rugged forest road!', 'The forest road is bumpy!', 'You're having trouble on the forest road!']
['You hit a big stone!', 'A huge stone on the road!', 'A stone damaged the car!']
['Torrential rain reduces visibility!', 'Bad weather, torrential rain!', 'The car is barely moving due to the rain!']
['Black ice on the road, be careful!', 'The car is slipping due to black ice!', 'Caution, icy road!']
['Heavy traffic, you're moving slowly!', 'The traffic is very crowded!', 'You're stuck in traffic!']
['An inattentive pedestrian crossed the road!', 'Watch out for pedestrians!', 'You avoided an inattentive pedestrian!']
['Free road, keep driving!', 'No obstacles on the road!', 'You're lucky to have a free road!']
['You stopped at the car service, the car was fixed!', 'The car is in good condition after the repair!', 'You made a stop at the car service!']
['You went to the vulcanization, changed the tires!', 'The tires have been repaired!', 'A visit to the vulcanization!']
['You stopped at the gas station to refuel.', 'The fuel tank is full after stopping at the gas station!', 'You refueled at the gas station!']
